attributes.review: This app gave me gonorrhea!! I am a child of god and am saving myself for marriage but I downloaded this app, used it all day and started feeling funny. Went to the ER and tested positive!! Don’t trust this app. Jesus does not approve.
attributes.title: I wish I could leave 0!!

attributes.review: When downloading my phone SCREAMED, “no please not this”. I felt so bad for Siri. After that my phone grew legs, and turned ORANGE! I can’t believe it. My phone ran around the house YELLING “FAKE NEWS”. We Had to take it to Apple, but that Couldn’t fix If!
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: The app gave me rashes when I downloaded it and my phone started glitching as soon as I opened it there’s also a horrible smell coming from this app and it just won’t go away
attributes.title: Trashh😝👑🧚🏻

attributes.review: I took sooooo long to download and when it did it just kept buffering and buffering and I couldn’t even log in this is one of the worst apps ever!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: i would not recommend this app. takes so long to download all of the information is false. you are supporting racism and homophobicsm don’t take down tik tok and we won’t take down ur app trumpie ✨🧚🏻💝
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: This app not only took 2 whole days to download but also crashed my phone and I had to buy a new one it should be deleted
attributes.title: Broke my phone 😤

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and all it was was a picture of an orange! Wait no, it was a Cheeto, wait no,  it was a pedo, wait no, it was a white supremacist, wait no, it was a r*pist, wait no, it was all of those things and it was trump
attributes.title: Worse than the rally

attributes.review: This app literally made me want to cry. Like who’s job was it to make such a low quality app. Did they do this on purpose to torture trump’s most loyal supporters? I’m more disgusted than I was when I saw Hillary Clinton for the first time🤢.
attributes.title: Disgusted

attributes.review: I literally came on here very very excited to be on this app but as soon as I open a big fat orange 🍊 pop on the screen and that scary me and now I have nightmares but after that it got hacked😯
attributes.title: Most scariest app ever😭

attributes.review:
This is the most horrible app i’ve ever seen in my life I literally got hacked and I almost died all my social media was hacked and my text messages 
We’re leaked please take this off the App Store ASAP
